name: Ed Hendricks
seeking: Ed Hendricks of Lifestyle, providing lifestyle consulting and personal development services, likely seeks JV partners in the health, wellness, or personal growth space who serve clients looking to improve quality of life. Co-creating workshops, retreats, or joint programs in the lifestyle and personal development niche would be natural fits.
